text: aur hamane tumhaaree or yah kitaab haq ke saath utaaree hai, jo us kitaab kee pushti karatee hai jo usake pahale se maujood hai aur usakee sanrakshak hai. atah logon ke beech tum maamalon mein vahee faisala karana jo allaah ne utaara hai aur jo saty tumhaare paas aa chuka hai use chhodakar unakee ichchhaon ka paalan na karana. hamane tumamen se pratyek ke lie ek hee ghaat (shareeat) aur ek hee maarg nishchit kiya hai. yadi allaah chaahata to tum sabako ek samudaay bana deta. parantu jo kuchh usane tumhen diya hai, usamen vah tumhaaree pareeksha karana chaahata hai. atah bhalaee ke kaamon mein ek-doosare se aage badho. tum sabako allaah hee kee or lautana hai. phir vah tumhen bata dega, jisamen tum vibhed karate rahe ho
